name: I'd rather be young
description:
Fight with other old men. Use keyboard or gamepads.

Xbox gamepad controls:

Left stick - movement

A - grab item, use item, throw item

X - dash

Keyboard controls:

Arrows - movement

Space - grab item, use item, throw item

Alt - dash

Team:

Michał Błaszczyk

Konrad Sowisz

Bartosz Stochel

Team siedzi na parterze.
